TopicTitle: Is it possible to rename planets?

Articles.Content:
Hi. Im not sure if this is the right place to be asking, but anyway

Is there any way, mods or no mods, to rename a planet?

Pretty sure if you edit the .cfg files you can alter the planet names, but if you do that you will have to change every instance of where that planet names occurs. Be warned, I have no idea if this will actually work, it just seems like it would work.

After you install Real Solar System, you can go into GameData/RealSolarSystem/RealSolarSystem.cfg and press Ctrl+H (option+command+F on mac). Next search for "//bodyName" and replace them ALL with "bodyName. Finally, you go next to the "bodyName = (what ever it says)" and edit the (what ever it says) name to the planets name you want it to be. Save it and load up the game. If you have any questions, email me at [email protected]

Real Solar System (RSS): http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55145-0-90-Real-Solar-System-v8-5-Dec-23
